questions.question: Afghanistan became a Full Member of the ICC in 2017.
Ireland and Scotland both have Test status in international cricket.
Zimbabwe has never defeated Australia in a Test match.
The West Indies cricket team represents 15 Caribbean nations and territories.
South Africa was banned from international cricket from 1970 to 1991 due to apartheid policies.
Bangladesh was granted Test status before Zimbabwe.
The Netherlands cricket team has participated in multiple ICC Cricket World Cups.
India and Pakistan have never faced each other in an ICC tournament final.
New Zealand is the only Full Member nation that has never hosted a Cricket World Cup.
All current Full Member nations have won at least one ICC tournament.
